```suggestion
    from functools import partial
    ...
    def _filter_servers(self):
        def server_entry_is_valid(s, l, t, i):
            return (
                s.datacenter.location.name in l and
                s.server_type.name in t and
                s.image in i
            )
        server_entry_matches_lti = partial(
            server_entry_is_valid,
            l=self.get_option('locations'),
            t=self.get_option('types'),
            i=self.get_option('images'),
        )
        self.servers = [s for s in self.servers if server_entry_matches_lti(s)]
```
We have decided to let the things as it is at the moment, because it is just "simple" and easy to understand.

The name of an image can be None, if the name is None you should go on the non unique description.

Images with names are only our system images. Without names are backups or snapshots.
